name: Burnt Out (Pancake, Cipher)
description:
"Local vampire would very much like teenagers to stop sneaking into their mansion and fixing the electric lines, says they're getting burnout from calling the electricians to re-break them"

For some, less light is more.

Help a friendly local vampire turn off the lights in their home, by helping them reach the lightswitch. Beware, however, as the vampire is burned by the very lightbulbs they aim to turn off.

Made for the Blackthornprod Game Jam #3

Created by PancakeDev and De-Ciphered
